game.name: Crazy Birds
game.description:
The online Crazy Birds puzzle games happen to be the most patience full online games to the core objective of getting the optimum level of gaming satisfaction and enjoyment. What makes the free online puzzle games so unique from a player?s perspective is the endless level of quest and mystery involved in the game that keeps a player hanging on till the last moment in wait about the next sudden activity in the game.

Therefore to get the best enjoyment and craze from the play online puzzle games, the game of crazy birds has been introduced that has become one of the most popular online game for the puzzle game seekers and enthusiasts. The multiplayer online puzzle game Crazy Birds is the game that is known to be the best one for the serious gamers that can enjoy it in a 28 level games starting from the level one.

In the game, it is the crazy birds that are required to target the pigs and devastate them using the rubber band and hit them. For killing the pigs in the game, it is very necessary to hit straight them or make a mark upon the pillars upon which they use to stay quietly and calmly. However, when hitting the pig, there a balance of marking is too necessary so that the bird may not run away from the goal absolutely and strikingly.
